import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Times } from '../times-enum'; @Component({ selector: 'app-offer-ride', templateUrl: './offer-ride.component.html', styleUrls: ['./offer-ride.component.scss'] }) export class OfferRideComponent implements OnInit { Times=Times; selectedTime:string="" circleCount:number=7; stopsCount:number=3; displayRemainingForm:boolean=false; selectedSeat:number=0; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } addStop(){ this.stopsCount+=1; (this.stopsCount%2==0)?this.circleCount+=4:this.circleCount+=5; } }
